mapper.select: SELECT a.SUB_NO, b.dept_nm AS dept_cd, a.SUB_NM, a.SUB_GRADE, a.SUB_HOUR, a.SUB_CRD, c.com_cd_nm as CRS_CLASSF_CD, a.SUB_OTL FROM subject a JOIN department b ON a.dept_cd = b.dept_cd join com_code c on a.crs_classf_cd = c.com_cd
select dept_cd, dept_nm from department where col_cd = #{colCd}

SELECT a.SUB_NO, b.dept_nm AS dept_cd, a.SUB_NM, a.SUB_GRADE, a.SUB_HOUR, a.SUB_CRD, c.com_cd_nm as CRS_CLASSF_CD, a.SUB_OTL FROM subject a JOIN department b ON a.dept_cd = b.dept_cd join com_code c on a.crs_classf_cd = c.com_cd where a.dept_cd = #{deptCd}

SELECT a.SUB_NO, b.dept_nm AS dept_cd, a.SUB_NM, a.SUB_GRADE, a.SUB_HOUR, a.SUB_CRD, c.com_cd_nm as CRS_CLASSF_CD, a.SUB_OTL FROM subject a JOIN department b ON a.dept_cd = b.dept_cd join com_code c on a.crs_classf_cd = c.com_cd join college d on d.COL_CD = b.COL_CD where d.COL_CD = #{colCd}

SELECT a.LECAP_NO, LECSC_DAY, PERIOD_CD, LECSC_HOUR, c.SUB_NM, d.PRO_NM FROM LECTURE_SCHEDULE a JOIN LECTURE_APLY b ON a.LECAP_NO = b.LECAP_NO JOIN SUBJECT c ON b.SUB_NO = c.SUB_NO JOIN professor d ON b.PRO_NO = d.PRO_NO WHERE b.FLCTS_NO = #{flctsNo} AND b.APRV_STTS_CD !='rej' AND b.LECAP_YR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND b.LECAP_SEM = CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE)= 6 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END

SELECT A.LECAP_NO, A.LECAP_DT, A.LECAP_YR, A.LECAP_SEM, B.SUB_NM, D.FLCT_NM, C.FLCTS_NM, A.APRV_STTS_CD FROM LECTURE_APLY A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_NO = B.SUB_NO JOIN FACILITIES C ON A.FLCTS_NO = C.FLCTS_NO JOIN FACILITY D ON C.FLCT_NO = D.FLCT_NO WHERE PRO_NO = #{PRONO} ORDER BY 2 DESC
